text: Pavlína Horálková (born 24 May 1991) is a Czech ice hockey player for Biryusa Krasnoyarsk and the Czech national team.2019 IIHF Women's World Championship roster She participated at the 2016 IIHF Women's World Championship.2016 World Championship roster ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Czech women's ice hockey defencemen Category:Czech expatriate ice hockey people Category:Czech expatriate sportspeople in Russia Category:People from Benešov
title: Pavlína Horálková
